title: Corda Flow Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the flow subsection.

maxRetryAttempts.description: The maximum number of retry attempts a transient error will be retried before failing the flow. A value of zero disables retries.

maxRetryDelay.description: The maximum delay before a retry is scheduled, in milliseconds

maxFlowSleepDuration.description: The maximum delay before a periodic WakeUp is scheduled, in milliseconds

messageResendWindow.description: Length of time to wait before resending unacknowledged flow session messages, in milliseconds

heartbeatTimeout.description: Length of time to wait when no message has been received from a counterparty before causing the session to error, in milliseconds

p2pTTL.description: TTL set on on messages passed to the P2P layer to be sent to a counterparty.

event.description: Settings for external events within a flow

messageResendWindow.description: Length of time to wait before resending unprocessed external events, in milliseconds

maxRetries.description: The maximum amount of times to retry a request before returning an exception to the user code.
